textview.text: The text in the textboxes below are databound to textviews inside the popups.
The databinding expression is written so that it runs on the server, and takes at least 0.5 seconds.
If you change the textbox in the non-deferred section, a server-side daq will execute.
In the deferred section, the daq will only execute if you enter the popup.
Check the browser"s DevTools/Network window to see the executing daqs; filter on `ExecuteDaq`.
